languages.text: "Ты всю жизнь ненавидела свои голоса, боялась их. Не стоит. Ведь они — часть тебя. Впусти их в себя полностью. Открой дверь".
"All your life, you have hated the voices, feared them. Don't. After all, they are part of you. Let them in, all of them. Open the door."
languages.original_text: "Ты всю жизнь ненавидела свои голоса, боялась их. Не стоит. Ведь они — часть тебя. Впусти их в себя полностью. Открой дверь".

traits.locale_text: "All your life, you have hated the voices, feared them. Don't. After all, they are part of you. Let them in, all of them. Open the door."
"All your life, you have hated the voices, feared them. Don't. After all, they are part of you. Let them in, all of them. Open the door."
"All your life, you have hated the voices, feared them. Don't. After all, they are part of you. Let them in, all of them. Open the door."
"All your life, you have hated the voices, feared them. Don't. After all, they are part of you. Let them in, all of them. Open the door."
"All your life, you have hated the voices, feared them. Don't. After all, they are part of you. Let them in, all of them. Open the door."

languages.text: “你这辈子都在痛恨那些声音，惧怕它们，但这其实没必要，毕竟它们也是你的一部分。只要让它们进来就好了，全都进来，把门打开。”
languages.original_text: "All your life, you have hated the voices, feared them. Don't. After all, they are part of you. Let them in, all of them. Open the door."

traits.locale_text: “你这辈子都在痛恨那些声音，惧怕它们，但这其实没必要，毕竟它们也是你的一部分。只要让它们进来就好了，全都进来，把门打开。”

languages.text: «Durante toda tu vida has odiado las voces. Las has temido. No lo hagas. Después de todo, son parte de ti. Déjalos entrar a todos. Abre la puerta».
languages.original_text: "All your life, you have hated the voices, feared them. Don't. After all, they are part of you. Let them in, all of them. Open the door."

traits.locale_text: «Durante toda tu vida has odiado las voces. Las has temido. No lo hagas. Después de todo, son parte de ti. Déjalos entrar a todos. Abre la puerta».

languages.text: "Euer gesamtes Leben lang habt Ihr die Stimmen gehasst, sie gefürchtet. Tut das nicht. Sie sind schließlich Teil von Euch. Lasst sie hinein, alle. Öffnet die Tür."
languages.original_text: "All your life, you have hated the voices, feared them. Don't. After all, they are part of you. Let them in, all of them. Open the door."

traits.locale_text: "Euer gesamtes Leben lang habt Ihr die Stimmen gehasst, sie gefürchtet. Tut das nicht. Sie sind schließlich Teil von Euch. Lasst sie hinein, alle. Öffnet die Tür."

languages.text: 「お前はずっと、そうした声を憎み、恐れてきた。もうよせ。結局のところ、それはお前の一部なのだ。すべてを受け入れるといい。扉を開けるんだ」
languages.original_text: "All your life, you have hated the voices, feared them. Don't. After all, they are part of you. Let them in, all of them. Open the door."

traits.locale_text: 「お前はずっと、そうした声を憎み、恐れてきた。もうよせ。結局のところ、それはお前の一部なのだ。すべてを受け入れるといい。扉を開けるんだ」

languages.text: « Toute votre vie, vous avez détesté ces voix, vous les avez craintes. Acceptez-les. Elles font partie de vous. Laissez-les entrer, toutes autant qu'elles sont. Ouvrez la porte. »
languages.original_text: "All your life, you have hated the voices, feared them. Don't. After all, they are part of you. Let them in, all of them. Open the door."

traits.locale_text: « Toute votre vie, vous avez détesté ces voix, vous les avez craintes. Acceptez-les. Elles font partie de vous. Laissez-les entrer, toutes autant qu'elles sont. Ouvrez la porte. »

languages.text: "Hayatın boyunca seslerden nefret ettin, onlardan korktun. Bunlara gerek yok. Onlar da senin bir parçan. Kapılarını aç, bırak içeri girsinler. "
languages.original_text: "All your life, you have hated the voices, feared them. Don't. After all, they are part of you. Let them in, all of them. Open the door."

traits.locale_text: "Hayatın boyunca seslerden nefret ettin, onlardan korktun. Bunlara gerek yok. Onlar da senin bir parçan. Onlara kapılarını aç, bırak içeri girsinler. "
